block.p: BURTOFF-Harry. Age 86, on August 18, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Pearl Burtoff and Pearl Vogel. Loving companion of Blanche Rabinowitz. Devoted father of Eileen, Michele and Elliot. Adored grandfather of Erol, Eren, Robert and Dina. Dear brother of Clara, Jeanne and the late Dottie, Morris, Mae and Faygie. Services Monday, 12 noon, at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, LI.
